description: Viper 4+ screen freezing during field operation
recommended_action: Update to latest firmware - check power supply for voltage drops - replace SD card if corrupted

description: CR7 display not recognizing ISOBUS implement
recommended_action: Verify ISOBUS cable continuity - check implement UT version compatibility - power cycle both

description: RS1 slow RTK convergence time in morning
recommended_action: Allow 5-10 min warm-up - check Slingshot cellular signal - verify antenna has clear sky view

description: SmarTrax MD hunting or overcorrecting in turns
recommended_action: Re-calibrate steering sensitivity - check hydraulic valve response - verify line acquisition settings

description: SmarTrax AT motor slipping on steering column
recommended_action: Retorque column clamp - check motor gear condition - verify correct adapter for tractor model

description: Hawkeye nozzle PWM erratic spray pattern
recommended_action: Check nozzle wiring harness - verify system pressure - clean PWM valve seats - recalibrate

description: AccuFlow servo valve not responding to rate changes
recommended_action: Check servo valve wiring - verify flow meter calibration - inspect valve for debris

description: Slingshot RTK losing fix in areas with poor cell coverage
recommended_action: Check cellular antenna placement - verify data plan active - consider repeater or external antenna

description: Slingshot data sync failing between field and office
recommended_action: Verify cellular signal - check Slingshot account status - power cycle modem - re-pair display

description: VSN row guidance losing rows in heavy canopy
recommended_action: Adjust camera angle - clean lens - check lighting conditions - verify row spacing settings

description: Sidekick Pro pump priming issues at startup
recommended_action: Verify product in tank - check pump prime sequence - inspect check valves - bleed air from lines

description: CAN bus errors between Viper 4+ and RS1
recommended_action: Check CAN termination - inspect cable at connectors - verify baud rate and node address settings
